ingredients: flour, salt, sugar, water, yeast
reference:
Title: Homemade Pizza Dough
Step 1: Put yeast, warm water and sugar in a small bowl.
Step 2: In a large bowl, add the flour, salt/yeast mixture and warm water.
Step 3: Mix together, then on a floured surface, knead for a few minutes.
Step 4: Put dough into a well-greased bowl.
Step 5: Cover with wax paper.
Step 6: Let rise for 1 hour, then spread dough onto a well-greased pizza pan or cookie sheet.
Step 7: Let rise another 1/2 hour.
Step 8: Bake at 350° or until crust is brown on bottom.
hypothesis:
title: french bread
step 1: dissolve yeast in warm water.
step 2: add sugar, salt and 1 1/2 cups flour.
step 3: beat until smooth.
step 4: add rest of flour until it can be handled.
step 5: knead until smooth and elastic.
step 6: place in greased bowl.
step 7: cover and let rise until double.
step 8: punch down and divide into 3 parts.
step 9: let rest 10 minutes.
step 10: shape into long french loaves.
step 11: place on greased cookie sheet.
step 12: slash tops.
step 13: cover and let rise until double.
step 14: bake at 400° for 25 minutes.

ingredients: baking powder, black walnut, black walnut flavoring, butter, crisco, eggs, flour, milk, sugar, vanilla
reference:
Title: Black Walnut Pound Cake
Step 1: Mix all ingredients as listed.
Step 2: Grease, flour and spray Pam on a tube pan.
Step 3: Bake at 325° for 1 hour or until done.
Step 4: May be frosted with a mocha frosting or eaten plain.
hypothesis:
title: black walnut cake
step 1: cream butter and crisco.
step 2: add sugar, a little at a time.
step 3: beat until fluffy.
step 4: add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.
step 5: sift flour and baking powder together.
step 6: add alternately with milk to creamed mixture.
step 7: add flavoring and nuts.
step 8: bake in tube pan for 1 hour and 20 minutes at 325°.

ingredients: coconut, coconut cream, coconut cream instant pudding, cream cheese, flour, margarine, milk, nuts, sugar, whip
reference:
Title: Coconut Delight
Step 1: If desired, use extra Cool Whip, coconut and nuts for the 4th layer.
hypothesis:
title: coconut dessert
step 1: mix flour, margarine and nuts together.
step 2: press into a 9 x 13-inch pan.
step 3: bake at 350° for 15 minutes.
step 4: cool.
step 5: mix cream cheese, sugar and 1/2 of the cool whip.
step 6: spread over the crust.
step 7: mix pudding and milk.
step 8: spread over cream cheese mixture.
step 9: spread remaining cool whip over pudding.
step 10: sprinkle with coconut.
step 11: refrigerate.

ingredients: basil, bundl basil, garlic, heavy cream, nuts, olive oil, parmesan cheese, parsley, pine nut, ravioli, salt, salt pepper
reference:
Title: Creamy Pesto And Ravioli
Step 1: Put first 4 ingredients in blender.
Step 2: Blend slowly to paste consistency.
Step 3: Add cheese when smooth.
Step 4: Add olive oil in steady stream with blender running.
Step 5: Add cream and blend.
Step 6: Pour over ravioli.
Step 7: Garnish with parsley.
Step 8: Also good on tortellini.
Step 9: Serves 4.
hypothesis:
title: ravioli with pesto cream sauce
step 1: place basil, parsley, garlic, pine nuts, parmesan cheese, and olive oil in a food processor and process until smooth.
step 2: add heavy cream and pulse until incorporated.
step 3: season with salt and pepper.
step 4: cook ravioli according to package directions.
step 5: toss ravioli with pesto cream sauce.

ingredients: butter, cocoa, milk, oat, peanut butter, white sugar
reference:
Title: No Bake Cookies
Step 1: Mix and cook for 1 minute sugar, cocoa, milk and butter. Remove from heat, then add peanut butter and oats. Mix well and spoon on waxed paper.
hypothesis:
title: chocolate oatmeal cookies
step 1: boil together for 1 minute the sugar, butter, cocoa and milk. remove from heat and add peanut butter and oats.
step 2: drop by teaspoonfuls onto waxed paper.

ingredients: bacon fat, bay, butter, canned tomato, grilled dog, onion, pepper, rice, sugar, tomato
reference:
Title: Hot Dogs With Fried Rice And Tomatoes
Step 1: Melt butter or bacon fat.
Step 2: Add rice and saute until yellow. Add onion and cook 2 minutes.
Step 3: Add tomatoes, seasonings and herbs. Cover and cook 15 to 20 minutes until rice is tender.
Step 4: Arrange hot grilled hot dogs on hot platter and pour rice and tomato mixture around them.
Step 5: Yields 6 servings.
hypothesis:
title: red rice
step 1: heat fat and add onion.
step 2: cook until brown.
step 3: add tomatoes, bay leaf, sugar and pepper.
step 4: simmer for 20 minutes.
step 5: add rice and cook for 15 minutes longer.
step 6: add hot dogs and cook 10 minutes longer.

ingredients: baking powder, blueberry, eggs, flour, floured blueberry, milk, nutmeg, salt, shortening, sugar
reference:
Title: Blueberry Cake("Local Bake-Off Winner")
Step 1: Cream shortening and sugar.
Step 2: Then add egg and milk.
Step 3: Beat until smooth.
hypothesis:
title: blueberry muffins
step 1: mix together flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and nutmeg. beat egg and add milk and shortening.
step 2: add to dry ingredients and stir until moist.
step 3: fold in blueberries.
step 4: fill greased muffin pans 2/3 full.
step 5: bake at 400° for 20 to 25 minutes.

ingredients: chif, crab meat, cream cheese, garlic, garlic salt, lemon juice, light cream, mayonnaise, onion, salt, tabasco sauce, worcestershire sauce
reference:
Title: Hot Crab Dip
Step 1: Pour lemon juice over crab meat and let drain.
Step 2: Combine remaining ingredients in saucepan and add crab.
Step 3: Heat slowly and serve over assorted crackers.
hypothesis:
title: crab dip
step 1: mix all ingredients together.
step 2: chill for several hours.
step 3: serve with crackers.
